script.title: SmartSheet To BigQuery
script.description: Move sheet data into a BigQuery table.
instructions: Locate the ID of a sheet by viewing its properties.
Provide a BigQuery dataset ( must exist ) and table to write the data into.
StarThinker will automatically map the correct schema.

field.name: link
field.description: Add a link to each row as the first column.

field.name: table
field.description: Table to create from this report.

field.name: schema
field.description: Schema provided in JSON list format or empty list.
